content: aaaammmmeeeerrrriiiiccccaaaannnn ggggiiiirrrrllll lllliiiittttttttlllleeee ffffllllaaaammmmeeeennnnccccoooo ddddrrrreeeessssssss bbbbyyyy ppppaaaattttrrrriiiicccciiiiaaaa kkkklllloooonnnnoooosssskkkkiiii materials ww yarn size g hook yarn needle small amount of ribbon abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet v_stitch 1dc ch1 1dc all in same stitch shell 2dc ch1 2dc all in same stitch note the ch2 at the beginning of each row counts as a stitch bodice starting with neckline and with g hook chain 37 row 1 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and in each of the next 4 chs v_stitch in next chain double_crochet in next 4 chs v_stitch in next chain double_crochet in next 12 chs v_stitch in next chain double_crochet in next 4 chs v_stitch in next chain double_crochet in last 6 chs ch2 turn row 2 *double_crochet to the first ch1 space v_stitch in that ch1 space* repeat *-* to end of row ch2 turn row 3-repeat row 2 row 4- creating the arm holes double_crochet to first ch1 space double_crochet ch1 in that space skip to the next ch1 space double_crochet in that space and in every stitch to the next ch1 space double_crochet ch1 in that space skip to next ch1 space double_crochet in that space and in every stitch to the end of the row ch2 turn your arm holes are now complete row 5- double_crochet in each stitch to end join to the top of the chain 2 in row 4 you will now be working in the round round 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each stitch around join to the top of chain 2 round 7- chain 2 double_crochet in next stitch *skip a stitch v_stitch in next stitch * repeat *-* to end join to the top of chain 2 rounds 8- chain 2 double_crochet in the next stitch *skip a stitch v_stitch in the chain one space of the v stitch in the previous row * repeat *-* to end join to the top of the chain 2 row 9-10 repeat row 8 round 11-chain 2 double_crochet in next stitch *shell in the chain 1 space of the v_stitch in the previous round * repeat *-* to end join to the top of chain 2 rounds 12-15- chain 2 double_crochet in the next stitch shell in the center of the shell in the previous round join to the top of chain 2 finish off and sew in ends you can close the opening in the back of the dress in any way you would like i usually use a piece of ribbon you can also single_crochet around the opening and neckline to give a more finished look have fun pk 7/18/18
